title: At Kupiansk direction Russian army shelled Synkivka, Ivanivka, Berestove of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airstr...
content: At Kupiansk direction Russian army shelled Synkivka, Ivanivka, Berestove of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Novoyehorivka, Ivanivka, Kyslivka of Kharkiv region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
